metadata.feature_description: Search for users and filter by various status criteria

steps.action: Navigate to Users panel in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Users panel opens with list of users and search/filter controls
steps.actual: Users panel opened successfully showing user list with filter dropdown and search box

steps.action: Enter 'claude' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Users matching 'claude' in name should be displayed
steps.actual: Only 'Claude TestUser' was displayed, matching the search term

steps.action: Enter 'testuser123@test.com' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: User with matching email should be displayed
steps.actual: Only 'Test User123' with email testuser123@test.com was displayed

steps.action: Click on filter dropdown to view available filter options
steps.expected: Dropdown should show filter options including Authorized
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed with options: Authorized, Unauthorized, Deleted, Superusers, All

steps.action: Verify Authorized filter shows authorized users
steps.expected: List should display only authorized users
steps.actual: Default filter is Authorized, showing 21 authorized users

steps.expected: List should display only unauthorized users
steps.actual: Filter changed to Unauthorized, showing 1 unauthorized user (Test Regular User with testuser2026)

steps.expected: List should display deleted users or show empty state message
steps.actual: Filter changed to Deleted, showing 'No users found.' message indicating no deleted users exist

steps.expected: List should display only superuser accounts
steps.actual: Filter changed to Superusers, showing 'SuperUser Account' (host user)

steps.action: Select 'All' filter and navigate to page 2
steps.expected: Page 2 of users should be displayed
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2, showing entries 11-20 of 22
Filter changed and user list shows first page of results (Claude TestCreate as first user)

steps.expected: Results should show only authorized users matching 'NewUser'
steps.actual: Only 'Test NewUser' displayed, which is an authorized user matching the search term

steps.action: Clear the search box by entering empty text and pressing Enter
steps.expected: Full list of users should be displayed again
steps.actual: Search cleared and full list of 21 authorized users displayed (1-10 of 21)

steps.expected: Users with 'Claude' (mixed case) in their name should be found
steps.actual: Found 'Claude TestCreate' and 'Claude TestUser' - case-insensitive search works correctly

observations: No 'Locked' filter option is available in the UI. The filter dropdown contains: Authorized, Unauthorized, Deleted, Superusers, All. The suggested test scenario 'Filter by locked users' cannot be performed via UI as no such filter exists.

Real-time search updates: The search is triggered on Enter key press rather than on every keystroke. This is a deliberate design choice as seen in the code where the FiltersBar component handles the search via the onChange callback.
Filter persistence during pagination was implicitly tested during the pagination reset test - filters remain active while navigating between pages.
